comment.author: 14205036@N08
comment._content:
Do you know the location of this
"Yangkai" in China? Is it still called Yangkai?

I'm planning a trip to China, and my grandfather served at this air-force base, so I'd like to know the location and if anything still stands.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/14205036@N08] Sorry, we are not sure. There is no more additional information on the original photo. This is what I found: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yangkai_Airfield
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
